description.narrative: (i) Increased access to credit for micro borrowers in Cambodia. (ii) Banking transformation: If Prasac''s intended transformation becomes successful, it will have a demonstration effect and provide another role model for MFIs to better serve their customers.

The proposed project aims to provide a senior loan of up to US$10 million to Prasac Microfinance Institution Limited. (Prasac or Company) in order to support its further growth in the market, especially its lending to micro and SME borrowers.

mailing-address.narrative: SIM Senacheert, President and CEO Prasac Microfinance Institution Limited Building 212, Street 271, Sangkat Tuol Tumpung 2, Khan Chamkarmon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia Website: http://www.prasac.com.kh Email: mailto:senacheert@prasac.com.kh Tel: +855 23 22 01 02 Fax: +855 23 21 63 62

name.narrative: Prasac is headquartered in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, and has a network of 170 offices in 24 provinces. Investments in Prasac will be made throughout the country.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.

sector.narrative: O-HA - Microfinance and Small Business - Non Commercial Banking
